general.title: General Information
general.content: This Privacy Policy defines the rules for processing and protecting personal data of Users using our web application (hereinafter "Application").

administrator.title: Personal Data Administrator
administrator.content: The administrator of personal data is eCopywriting.pl Karol LeszczyÅ„ski, based in Poland, Papowo Biskupie 119/18, registered under NIP: 9562203948, REGON: 340627879 (hereinafter "Administrator").

general.contact: Contact regarding personal data protection is possible via email: kontakt [at] ecopywriting.pl or in writing to the Administrator's address.

voluntary.title: Data provided voluntarily during registration and login:
items: Google account profile data (when using Google login)

automatic.title: Automatically collected data:
items: Device information (screen resolution, operating system, browser)
Application performance data (loading time, rendering metrics)
Analytics data from TikTok Pixel (user ID, interaction information)

analytical.title: Analytical data:
items: TikTok Pixel conversion and user behavior statistics

usage.title: How we use Google user data:

protection.title: Google Data Protection:
items: Google user data is never sold to third parties
Access to Google data is strictly limited to essential service functionality
Data is encrypted during transmission and storage
Regular security audits of data access

usage.title: We use TikTok Pixel for user behavior analysis and ad performance measurement

protection.title: TikTok Data Protection:
items: Data is processed in accordance with TikTok privacy policy
Users can control tracking through their browser settings
Data is encrypted during storage and transmission
We regularly monitor and analyze data security

legitInterests.title: Legitimate interests of the Administrator (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR):

analytics.title: Google Analytics, Microsoft Clarity and Cookies
analytics.content: We use Google Analytics and Microsoft Clarity to analyze Application traffic. Data is collected in accordance with Google and Microsoft privacy policies.
analytics.cookieManagement: Users can manage their consent for data processing for analytical purposes through the cookie settings panel available in the Application.

cookieTypes.title: We use the following types of cookies:

recipients.title: Access to data may be granted to:
items: Technical and analytical service providers (Google Analytics, Microsoft)
State authorities based on legal requirements

userRights.title: User Rights
rights: Complaint to the supervisory authority (President of UODO)

periods.account: Account data: for the duration of account ownership and 6 months after deletion

measures.title: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure personal data security:

changes.title: Privacy Policy Changes
changes.content: We reserve the right to make changes to the Privacy Policy.
changes.notification: Users will be informed about all changes through an Application notification or email message.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions regarding the Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

general.title: Â§1. General Provisions
items: These Terms of Service define the rules for using the Smart-Edu.ai online service, available at https://smart-edu.ai.
The owner and administrator of Smart-Edu.ai is eCopywriting.pl Karol LeszczyÅ„ski, based in Papowo Biskupie 119/18, registered in the business register under NIP (Tax ID) 9562203948, REGON 340627879.

items.User: a natural person or legal entity using the Service
items.Account: individual User profile in the Service
items.Order: text generation request submitted by the User

registration.title: Â§2. Registration and Service Use
items: Using the Service requires creating an Account through the registration process.
During registration, the User provides a name/nickname, chooses a unique email address, creates a secure password, and consents to personal data processing.
Registration can be completed through the Service registration form or Google Account (OAuth).
The User agrees to provide a valid email address and maintain login credentials confidentiality.

services.title: Â§3. Service Provision Rules
items: The Service provides text generation using artificial intelligence - various Claude models.
The text ordering process includes: selecting text language, specifying text length, providing guidelines and topic, optional keyword additions, and reference source additions.
The completion time for one text ranges from several to several dozen minutes and is estimated individually based on text length and current system load.
The Service reserves the right to refuse order execution, extend completion time, and modify service parameters.

payments.title: Â§4. Payments and Settlements
items: The minimum order amount is 20 PLN.
Payments can be made through: bank transfer, card payments, BLIK, PayPal, and other available payment methods.
Payment must be completed before text generation begins.

refunds.title: Â§5. Refund and Complaint Policy
items: Due to the digital nature of the service, ordered and delivered texts are non-refundable.
Complaints can be filed in case of: not receiving the ordered text, receiving text inconsistent with the order, or technical errors in the ordering process.
Complaints must be submitted within 14 days of the problem occurrence.
The Service processes complaints within 14 business days.

rights.title: Â§6. User Rights and Obligations
items: The User has the right to: use all available Service functions, place orders, submit complaints through the contact form or via email, and receive technical support.
The User agrees to: comply with the Terms of Service, not undertake actions harmful to the Service, not violate intellectual property rights, and maintain login credentials confidentiality.

intellectual.title: Â§7. Intellectual Property
items: The User may use ordered texts for any purpose, in compliance with applicable laws.
The Service is not responsible for how texts are used by the User.

data.title: Â§8. Personal Data Protection
items: The Administrator processes personal data in accordance with GDPR and applicable regulations.
Data is processed for: service provision, payment processing, User communication, legal obligations fulfillment, and analytical and statistical purposes.
Detailed information can be found in the Privacy Policy.

liability.title: Â§9. Liability
items: The Service makes every effort to ensure generated texts are of high quality.
The Service is not liable for: service interruptions caused by force majeure, damages resulting from improper text use, content provided by Users, or actions of third parties.

final.title: Â§10. Final Provisions
items: These Terms of Service come into effect on December 6, 2024.
The Service reserves the right to modify the Terms of Service.
Users will be notified of Terms of Service changes 14 days in advance.
Using the Service after changes are implemented indicates acceptance.

FAQSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQSection.subtitle: Everything you need to know about ordering academic papers

faq1.question: How does ordering academic papers work?
faq1.answer: Simply create a free account, specify your topic, length, and guidelines. Our AI will generate your paper in just 5 minutes. You can then download it in PDF or DOCX format.

faq2.question: Is AI-generated content reliable?
faq2.answer: Yes! Smart-Edu.AI uses advanced Claude models to create high-quality academic papers based on verified sources. Each paper is professionally written and factually accurate.

faq3.question: Can I order papers on any subject?
faq3.answer: Absolutely! Our AI supports all academic subjects from primary school through university level, including humanities, sciences, and technical subjects.

faq4.question: How long does it take to generate a paper?
faq4.answer: Most papers are generated within 5 minutes. For longer works like bachelor's or master's theses, generation may take up to 15-20 minutes.

faq5.question: Can I edit the generated paper?
faq5.answer: Yes! You receive the paper in editable formats (PDF and DOCX), so you can freely modify and personalize the content to your needs.
